body:
Hey! Thank you for the reply. So, I used the update Honeybee component and now I'm getting a different message:  **"3. Honeybee cannot find a compatible EnergyPlus folder on your system.**
**Make sure you have EnergyPlus installed on your system.**
**You won't be able to run energy simulations without EnergyPlus.**
**Honeybee supports following versions:**
**V8-4-0, V8-3-0, V8-2-10, V8-2-9, V8-2-8, V8-2-7, V8-2-6, V8-2-5, V8-2-4, V8-2-3, V8-2-2, V8-2-1, V8-2-0, V8-1-5, V8-1-4, V8-1-3, V8-1-2, V8-1-1, V8-1-0" .** So now it seems like the only version of E+ it doesn't support is V8-5-0. Do I need to uninstall it to set a  V8-4-0 version?  Or maybe this is still not the latest version of Honeybee? Is there is a different way of updating it?
